typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MTART as string,
		GEWEI as string,
		VOLUM as decimal(10,0),
		VOLEH as string,
		RAUBE as string,
		ETIFO as string,
		EAN11 as string,
		LAENG as decimal(10,0),
		BREIT as decimal(10,0),
		HOEHE as decimal(10,0),
		MEABM as string,
		MATNR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MARA
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		MAKTG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MAKT
MAKT,MARA join(MAKT@MATNR == MARA@MATNR,
 joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> jnrMARA
jnrMARA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	insertable:true,mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MARA@MATNR,
		ItemDescription = MAKTX,
		InformationLabelText = ETIFO,
		DescriptiveLabelText = MAKTG,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber = EAN11,
		ItemLength = LAENG,
		ItemWidth = BREIT,
		ItemHeight = HOEHE,
		LwhUomId = MEABM,
		ItemVolume = VOLUM,
		ItemVolumeUomId = VOLEH,
		WeightUomId = GEWEI,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId = RAUBE,
		ItemTypeId = MTART
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Item
